Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed!
Reviews.Author: JTSOK
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because of the good price and because I figured that all flat screen TV makers could probably build a decent TV, now that flat screens have been out for years now.  But that was a mistake!  This TV displayed a "white screen of death" after only a total of about 20 hours of viewing time.  Unfortunately, the time had expired for me to be able to return it and am now left with another cheap TV doorstop.  I have had a similar experience with another "cheap brand" of TV a few years back, so this will be the last Black Friday special for me.  I will stick to Consumer Reports advice of buying a name-brand that has a good reliability record, though that is certainly no guarantee of a trouble-free product. ...but my experience has proven that it at least increases your chance of getting your money's worth.

Reviews.Title: Great in a bind!
Reviews.Author: ejones235
Reviews.Content: We had the hardest time finding a television with RCA and VGA inputs within our price range. Fortunately we found this television and it filled our video reviewing needs. It has great video quality and is easy to hook-up.

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: G. Buch
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace our bulky old 19 tv in our kitchen. also, we wanted a wall mount, to free up counter space. I bought it locally for $140+tax.It was easy to program and more user friendly than a Bravia I bought a couple yrs ago. it's got a good pic now that I have adjusted it for the room and lighting. but as I said already that was easy to do.

Reviews.Content: um....i haven't bought the tv yet but i just need help of knowing about this tv like if i can play a playstation 2 on it is for my little cousin thats why i'm wondering but the tv is for me
